text.name: ub_overloadingThreshold_long
text.text: Overloading early will only be possible if the first chamber is filled to at least this percentage. '-' means the feature is disabled.

text.name: ub_unloadingThreshold_long
text.text: Unloading early will only be possible if the bale has been filled to at least this percentage. '-' means the feature is disabled.
